title: Pavel Schwarc
text: Pavel Schwarc is a former <a href="Czechoslovakia">Czechoslovak</a> <a href="Slalom%20canoeing">slalom canoeist</a> who competed in the 1970s. He won two medals at the <a href="1977%20ICF%20Canoe%20Slalom%20World%20Championships">1977 ICF Canoe Slalom World Championships</a> in <a href="Spittal%20an%20der%20Drau">Spittal</a> with a gold in the C-2 team event and a silver in the C-2 event.
